item.title: Marilia add a quote by José Regio
item.description: "Não, não vou por aí! Só vou por onde Me levam meus próprios passos..." -- José Regio

item.title: Marilia add a quote by Will Ferguson
item.description: "There, stacked high on his desk, was a tower of paper. Thick slabs of manuscript. Slush. Unsolicited, unagented, unloved. This was where dreams came to die. Book proposals, cover letters, entire manuscripts – they gathered like so much detritus on the desks of publishers everywhere." -- Will Ferguson

item.title: Marilia add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
item.description: "But luxury has never appealed to me, I like simple things, books, being alone, or with somebody who understands." -- Daphne du Maurier

item.title: Marilia add a quote by Will Ferguson
item.description: "The two most important phrases in the human language are "If only" and "Maybe someday". Our past mistakes and our unrequited longings. The things we regret and the things we yearn for. That's what makes us who we are." -- Will Ferguson
